text: I'm on the HCG diet and made a great hcg meat spaghetti sauce. It was good but definately needed pasta. I ordered these and put the same sauce on them and it was almost like eating pasta. There is no smell or taste to the noodles so they take on the taste of the sauce or soup you put them in. I definately feel fuller and it stays with you longer (makes not cheating easier). I plan to continue to use these even after the diet so I can continue to enjoy Italian recipes without the calories. I ordered the rice and use those in my chicken spinach soup.
